reviewText: Having photographed hundreds of pin-up girls, I found Ludella Hahn's Pinup Secrets to be fun, practical and packed with key tips. One of the most valuable aspects of this DVD is how practical these tips are for the pin-up debutante as well as the plain-Jane. Follow Ludella's secrets and you too can become a pin-up model (or just look like one).

This DVD is wonderful from start to finish. Ludella is both very down to earth and sweet. The video has great breakdowns with easy to understand and clear instructions, covering all aspects of pinup modeling and different parts of the industry. There's fun music playing in the background and she is quick to capture you with her charm. This is much more fun than scrambling for different video tutorials or reading tips. All you have to do next is book your shoot!! This would also be a great purchase as a fan of Ludella's so you can see her work her talents or a great instructional guide for photographers wanting to venture to pinup. I loved it!!
If you really want to know how to be a pin up girl, this is the DVD for you. Whether you are a model or just girl who loves the look/lifestyle- Ludella can help you!
